column4: You do not want to miss this event. Spring Groove is an amazing musician who lives in LA and has traveled extensively throughout the U.S. and Europe singing mantra and playing music that moves the spirit. She will be in South Florida for a short time and her only performance will be right here in our very own Delray Beach. Please check out one of her videos at http://youtu.be/wgJrj8wRVCQ and her site at http://springgroove.com/ Accompanying her will be Richard Brookens on Tablas, Cajon, Udus, Flutes and Saxophones. Check his music out on FB at https://www.facebook.com/pages/Richard-BrookensYellow-Bell-Music/205267496175809?fref=ts (look for the music store) and his site at http://www.yellowbellmusic.com/download There s a cover charge for this evening of $15 in advance and $20 night of. I assure you it will be worth it!!! Here is the paypal link for prepaying. https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=FRUUA7UJ69KPC As always we will start with a potluck dinner. We look forward to seeing you at this event!!! In the meantime we send you love and light!!!
